name: 蘇嘉冠
objective:
本課程探討人工智慧(AI)與工程應用相關議題，並討論解決方法與技術發展趨勢。內容由淺入深包含基礎 Python 程式設計、資料預處理、資料探索、機器學習、深度學習、AI 工程應用介紹及專題製作。學生可由本課程了解 AI 之基本原理，及 AI 在工程上的應用，以作為進入產業後了解如何導入人工智慧於產業應用之中，提昇工程背景學生 AI 應用及程式設計的技能。
This course will introduce Artificial Intelligence (AI) and its applications in engineering fields. The materials include basic Python programming,data prepossessing, data exploration, machine learning, deep learning, AI applications in engineering fields and final projects. Students can learn about the basic principles of AI and its applications in engineering fields, and they will understand how to apply AI techniques into industrial applications and improve their programming capabilities for AI.
